definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]

sentences.english: The national leaders have approved the strategy of "promote economy cooperation around Beibu Gulf".

sentences.english: It is an inevitable choice to develop the strategy of famous brand for an enterprise in the keen market competitions.

sentences.english: His suggestion that Jiulong city must be a commercial port was strategic insight.

sentences.english: Strategic communication plays an important role in the implementation of its corporate strategy.

sentences.english: This text uses the general method, have confirmed Ferranini's marketing strategy.

sentences.english: Besides, Russia is also working on the localization of strategic missile research, development and manufacturing.

sentences.english: Constructing service chain is a necessity for the development of the Chinese retailing industry.

sentences.english: Since 2003, the Tourism-based Country Strategy has been established and implemented in Japan.
